verses.text: \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*, and \w search|strong="H1240"\w* was made in the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of the \w rolls|strong="H5609"\w*, \w where|strong="H8536"\w* the \w treasures|strong="H1596"\w* were laid \w up|strong="H5182"\w* in \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*.\f + \fr 6.1 \ft rolls: Chaldee, books\f*\f + \fr 6.1 \ft laid up: Chaldee, made to descend\f*

And there was \w found|strong="H7912"\w* at \w Achmetha|strong="H0307"\w*, in the \w palace|strong="H1001"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w province|strong="H4083"\w* of the \w Medes|strong="H4076"\w*, \w a|strong="H2298"\w* \w roll|strong="H4040"\w*, and \w therein|strong="H1459"\w* \add was\add* a \w record|strong="H1799"\w* \w thus|strong="H3652"\w* \w written|strong="H3790"\w*: \f + \fr 6.2 \ft Achmetha: or, Ecbatana, or, in a coffer\f*

In the \w first|strong="H2298"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \add the same\add* \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w made|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \add concerning\add* the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, Let the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* be \w builded|strong="H1124"\w*, the \w place|strong="H0870"\w* where they \w offered|strong="H1684"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H1685"\w*, and let the \w foundations|strong="H0787"\w* thereof be strongly \w laid|strong="H5446"\w*; the \w height|strong="H7314"\w* thereof \w threescore|strong="H8361"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0521"\w*, \add and\add* the \w breadth|strong="H6613"\w* thereof \w threescore|strong="H8361"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0521"\w*;

\add With\add* \w three|strong="H8532"\w* \w rows|strong="H5073"\w* of \w great|strong="H1560"\w* \w stones|strong="H0069"\w*, and a \w row|strong="H5073"\w* of \w new|strong="H2323"\w* \w timber|strong="H0636"\w*: and let the \w expenses|strong="H5313"\w* be \w given|strong="H3052"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w*:

And \w also|strong="H0638"\w* let the \w golden|strong="H1722"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3702"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3984"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, which \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5020"\w* took \w forth|strong="H5312"\w* out \w of|strong="H4481"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1965"\w* which \add is\add* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H2987"\w* unto \w Babylon|strong="H0895"\w*, be \w restored|strong="H8421"\w*, and brought \w again|strong="H1946"\w* unto the \w temple|strong="H1965"\w* which \add is\add* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, \add every one\add* to his \w place|strong="H0870"\w*, and \w place|strong="H5182"\w* \add them\add* in the \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w*.\f + \fr 6.5 \ft brought again: Chaldee, go\f*

\w Now|strong="H3705"\w* \add therefore\add*, \w Tatnai|strong="H8674"\w*, \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w Shethar-boznai|strong="H8370"\w*, and your \w companions|strong="H3675"\w* the \w Apharsachites|strong="H0671"\w*, which \add are\add* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, be \w ye|strong="H1934"\w* \w far|strong="H7352"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w thence|strong="H8536"\w*:\f + \fr 6.6 \ft your…: Chaldee, their societies\f*

Let the \w work|strong="H5673"\w* of \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w alone|strong="H7662"\w*; let the \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* and the \w elders|strong="H7868"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w build|strong="H1124"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* \w in|strong="H5922"\w* his \w place|strong="H0870"\w*.

Moreover \w I|strong="H4481"\w* \w make|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w* \w what|strong="H3964"\w* ye shall \w do|strong="H5648"\w* \w to|strong="H5974"\w* the \w elders|strong="H7868"\w* of \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* for the \w building|strong="H1124"\w* of \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w*: that of the \w king’s|strong="H4430"\w* \w goods|strong="H5232"\w*, \add even\add* \w of|strong="H1768"\w* the \w tribute|strong="H4061"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w forthwith|strong="H0629"\w* \w expenses|strong="H5313"\w* \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* unto \w these|strong="H0479"\w* \w men|strong="H1400"\w*, that they be \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w hindered|strong="H0989"\w*.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft I make…: Chaldee, by me a decree is made\f*\f + \fr 6.8 \ft hindered: Chaldee, made to cease\f*

And that \w which|strong="H4101"\w* they have need \w of|strong="H2818"\w*, both \w young|strong="H1123"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H8450"\w*, and \w rams|strong="H1798"\w*, and \w lambs|strong="H0563"\w*, for the burnt \w offerings|strong="H5928"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, \w wheat|strong="H2591"\w*, \w salt|strong="H4416"\w*, \w wine|strong="H2562"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H4887"\w*, according to the \w appointment|strong="H3983"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* which \add are\add* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*, let it \w be|strong="H1934"\w* \w given|strong="H3052"\w* them \w day|strong="H3118"\w* by \w day|strong="H3118"\w* \w without|strong="H3809"\w* \w fail|strong="H7960"\w*:

That they may \w offer|strong="H1934"\w* sacrifices of sweet \w savours|strong="H5208"\w* unto the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8065"\w*, and \w pray|strong="H6739"\w* for the \w life|strong="H2417"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, and of his \w sons|strong="H1123"\w*.\f + \fr 6.10 \ft of sweet…: Chaldee, of rest\f*

\w Also|strong="H4481"\w* I have \w made|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*, that \w whosoever|strong="H3606"\w* shall \w alter|strong="H8133"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w word|strong="H6600"\w*, let \w timber|strong="H0636"\w* be pulled \w down|strong="H5256"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* his \w house|strong="H1005"\w*, and being set \w up|strong="H2211"\w*, let him be \w hanged|strong="H4223"\w* \w thereon|strong="H5922"\w*; and let his \w house|strong="H1005"\w* be \w made|strong="H5648"\w* a \w dunghill|strong="H5122"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1836"\w*.\f + \fr 6.11 \ft let him…: Chaldee, let him be destroyed\f*

And the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* that hath caused his \w name|strong="H8036"\w* to \w dwell|strong="H7932"\w* \w there|strong="H8536"\w* \w destroy|strong="H4049"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w kings|strong="H4430"\w* and \w people|strong="H5972"\w*, that shall \w put|strong="H7972"\w* to their \w hand|strong="H3028"\w* to \w alter|strong="H8133"\w* \add and\add* to \w destroy|strong="H2255"\w* \w this|strong="H1791"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* which \add is\add* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*. \w I|strong="H0576"\w* \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* have \w made|strong="H7761"\w* a \w decree|strong="H2942"\w*; let it be \w done|strong="H5648"\w* with \w speed|strong="H0629"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="H0116"\w* \w Tatnai|strong="H8674"\w*, \w governor|strong="H6347"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5675"\w* the \w river|strong="H5103"\w*, \w Shethar-boznai|strong="H8370"\w*, and their \w companions|strong="H3675"\w*, \w according|strong="H6903"\w* to that which \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w* had \w sent|strong="H7972"\w*, \w so|strong="H3660"\w* they \w did|strong="H5648"\w* \w speedily|strong="H0629"\w*.

And the \w elders|strong="H7868"\w* of the \w Jews|strong="H3062"\w* \w builded|strong="H1124"\w*, and they \w prospered|strong="H6744"\w* through the \w prophesying|strong="H5017"\w* of \w Haggai|strong="H2292"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5029"\w* and \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w* the \w son|strong="H1247"\w* of \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w*. And they \w builded|strong="H1124"\w*, and \w finished|strong="H3635"\w* \add it\add*, \w according|strong="H4481"\w* to the \w commandment|strong="H2941"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0426"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, and according to the \w commandment|strong="H2942"\w* of \w Cyrus|strong="H3567"\w*, and \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w*, and \w Artaxerxes|strong="H0783"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* of \w Persia|strong="H6540"\w*.\f + \fr 6.14 \ft commandment: Chaldee, decree\f*

And \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* was \w finished|strong="H3319"\w* \w on|strong="H5705"\w* the \w third|strong="H8532"\w* \w day|strong="H3118"\w* of the \w month|strong="H3393"\w* \w Adar|strong="H0144"\w*, which \w was|strong="H1932"\w* in the \w sixth|strong="H8353"\w* \w year|strong="H8140"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4437"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* the \w king|strong="H4430"\w*.

¶ And the \w children|strong="H1123"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3549"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w*, and the \w rest|strong="H7606"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1123"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H1547"\w*, \w kept|strong="H5648"\w* the \w dedication|strong="H2597"\w* of \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* with \w joy|strong="H2305"\w*,\f + \fr 6.16 \ft the children of the captivity: Chaldee, the sons of the transportation\f*

And \w offered|strong="H7127"\w* at the \w dedication|strong="H2597"\w* of \w this|strong="H1836"\w* \w house|strong="H1005"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w* an \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H8450"\w*, two \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w rams|strong="H1798"\w*, \w four|strong="H0703"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3969"\w* \w lambs|strong="H0563"\w*; and for a sin \w offering|strong="H2402"\w* \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8648"\w* \w he|strong="H6841"\w* \w goats|strong="H5796"\w*, according to the \w number|strong="H4510"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7625"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3479"\w*.

And they \w set|strong="H6966"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3549"\w* in their \w divisions|strong="H6392"\w*, and the \w Levites|strong="H3879"\w* in their \w courses|strong="H4255"\w*, \w for|strong="H5922"\w* the \w service|strong="H5673"\w* of \w God|strong="H0426"\w*, which \add is\add* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3390"\w*; as it is \w written|strong="H3792"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5609"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4873"\w*.\f + \fr 6.18 \ft as it is…: Chaldee, according to the writing\f*

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* upon the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* \add day\add* of the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

For the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* were \w purified|strong="H2891"\w* \w together|strong="H0259"\w*, all of them \add were\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w*, and \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* for all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, and for their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and for themselves.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which were come \w again|strong="H7725"\w* out of \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, and all such as had \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* themselves unto them from the \w filthiness|strong="H2932"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, to \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*,

And \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* with \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had made them \w joyful|strong="H8055"\w*, and \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* unto them, to \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* in the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
